animation.condition: Control.HasFocus(9920) | Control.IsVisible(9922) | Window.IsActive(songinformation) | Window.IsActive(musicinformation) | Window.IsActive(movieinformation) | Control.HasFocus(9930) + Player.HasVideo + !Skin.HasSetting(fullscreentrailer)

control.visible: Window.IsVisible(progressdialog) | Window.IsVisible(virtualkeyboard) | Window.IsVisible(contextmenu) | Window.IsVisible(numericinput) | Window.IsVisible(shutdownmenu) | Window.IsVisible(playercontrols) | Window.IsVisible(filebrowser) | Window.IsVisible(networksetup) | Window.IsVisible(mediasource) | Window.IsVisible(profilesettings) | Window.IsVisible(contentsettings) | Window.IsVisible(favourites) | Window.IsVisible(smartplaylisteditor) | Window.IsVisible(smartplaylistrule) | Window.IsVisible(radiotimers) | Window.IsVisible(630) | Window.IsVisible(633) | Window.IsVisible(selectdialog)

animation.condition: Control.HasFocus(9920) | Control.IsVisible(608) | ControlGroup(9000).HasFocus | Window.IsVisible(volumebar) | Window.IsVisible(notification) | Library.IsScanningVideo | Library.IsScanningMusic | Window.IsVisible(extendedprogressdialog) | Window.IsVisible(1110) | Window.IsVisible(1103)

Control.HasFocus(9920) | Control.IsVisible(608) | ControlGroup(9000).HasFocus | Window.IsVisible(volumebar) | Window.IsVisible(notification) | Library.IsScanningVideo | Library.IsScanningMusic | Window.IsVisible(extendedprogressdialog) | Window.IsVisible(1110) | Window.IsVisible(1103) | [[Window.IsActive(tvchannels) | Window.IsActive(radiochannels)] + [Player.HasMedia + System.IdleTime(8)]]

includes.expression: String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,song) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,artist) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,album) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,movie) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,musicvideo) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,tvshow) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,season) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,episode) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,set) | Container.Content(addons) | Window.IsVisible(musicplaylist) | Window.IsVisible(videoplaylist)

String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,song) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,album) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,movie) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,musicvideo) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,tvshow) | Striing.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,season) | String.IsEqual(ListItem.DBType,episode) | Window.IsVisible(musicplaylist) | Window.IsVisible(videoplaylist)
